game.name: Manaclysm
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Manaclysm is a PvP brawler where up to 60 mages wage war across realms fractured by magic. Slay enemy mages to upgrade your mana and spell arsenal. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Manaclysm is a PvP brawler where up to 60 mages wage war across realms fractured by magic. Slay enemy mages to upgrade your mana and spell arsenal. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!
